title: MLOps Engineer
summary: Results-driven MLOps Engineer with 4 years of experience specializing in building, deploying, and managing scalable machine learning systems in production. Proficient in designing robust CI/CD pipelines, containerization, orchestration, and cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP). Passionate about automating the ML lifecycle and ensuring model reliability and performance.

cloud: AWS (S3, EC2, EKS, SageMaker, Lambda, DynamoDB)

description: Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines for ML models using GitLab CI and Kubeflow, reducing deployment time by 30%.
Managed and scaled Kubernetes clusters (EKS) for model serving and training, ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.
Developed infrastructure-as-code using Terraform to provision and manage AWS resources for ML workloads.
Implemented comprehensive monitoring and alerting for ML models in production using Prometheus and Grafana.
Collaborated with data scientists to containerize models and ensure reproducibility across development and production environments.
Assisted in the development and deployment of initial machine learning models for customer churn prediction.
Built and maintained data ingestion pipelines using Python and Apache Airflow for various data sources (SQL, S3).
Containerized existing ML models using Docker for easier deployment and version control.
Contributed to data warehousing efforts using PostgreSQL and AWS S3.
